import React, { useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {useSelector, useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {priceValidate} from '../../utils/validation/Validation' import {showSuccessMsg, showErrMsg} from '../../utils/notification/Notification' const initialState = { title:'', price: 0, description: '', location:'', category:'', phone:'', user:'', err: '', success:'' } function CreateProduct() { const [product, setProduct] = useState(initialState) const { title, price, description, location, category, phone, err, success } = product const auth = useSelector(state => state.auth) const token = useSelector(state => state.token) const {user} = auth const handleChangeInput = e => { const { name, value } = e.target setProduct({...product,[name]:value, err:'', success:''}) } const handleSubmit = async e => { e.preventDefault() if (isEmpty(title) || isEmpty(price) || isEmpty(description) || isEmpty(location) || isEmpty(category) || isEmpty(phone)) return setProduct({ ...product, err:"Please fill in all fields", success: '' }) if(priceValidate(price)) return setProduct({...product, err: "Price must be greater than or equal to 0", success: ''}) try { const res = await axios.post('api/products', { title, description, price, location ,category, phone, image, user }) setProduct({...product, err: '', success: res.data.msg}) } catch (err) { err.response.data.msg && setProduct({...product, err: err.response.data.msg, success: ''}) } } return (

Create Product
